content.raw: I can't say I'm a big fan of the incorrect error checking with the decorator approach, and the fact that we're manually adjusting `self.instructions` and `self.ramp_limits`. This means we have to keep the decorator up to date if we modify the internals of `Output`. Modifying the duration before adding the instruction would be more maintainable in the long run.
content.html: I can't say I'm a big fan of the incorrect error checking with the decorator approach, and the fact that we're manually adjusting self.instructions and self.ramp_limits. This means we have to keep the decorator up to date if we modify the internals of Output. Modifying the duration before adding the instruction would be more maintainable in the long run.
